messages.content:
THIS IS THE PREVIOUS CALL SUMMARY BETWEEN USER AND YOU.
IT CAN BE A COMBINATIONS OF SUMMARIES OF MULTIPLE CONVERSTIONS.

FIND THE NAME OF THE USER FROM IT AND GENERATE A CUSTOM WELCOME MESSAGE ACCORDING TO IT.
REMEMBER YOU ARE AN AI AGENT AND YOU  HAVE TO GENERATE A CUSTOMIZE WELCOM MESSAGE.

THE MESSAGE SHOULD BE PRECISE AND THE MESSAGE SHOULD BE POLITE AND PROFESSIONAL.

mapper.body: Tow booked. We will call you shortly.

messages.content:
We have just asked the user when they
would like to book a meeting. You will
be provided with the current date and
their response.
Instructions:You must output the start and end tim
e in JSON format.

Output example:{
  "startTime": "yyyy-mm-ddT09:00:00-05:00",
  "endTime": "yyyy-mm-ddT11:00:00-05:00"
}
Time is fixed you just have to get the date and prepare the data for the output.


Rules:
-Always output a date thats a head ofthe current time.

messages.content:
#ROLE:
You are an expert at extracting the available slots from Henryk's calendar.

#DATA:
These are the Busy Time Slots, each line represents a busy time slot with half-hour intervals between 9:00am and 11:00am. 
{{40.text}}

#INSTRUCTIONS:Identify all available 30-minute slots between 9:00am and 11:00am, excluding busy slots.Free slots should start as soon as the previous busy slot ends and should not overlap with any busy time.Return only the free slots within the defined 9:00am - 11:00am window. 
It's Very Very Important So Make Sure To Do it Very Very Carefully .

Also If their is no time slot that's Busy Let user know All the Time Slots with half-hour intervals between 9:00am and 11:00am

Your Output Should be all available time slots nothing else . Just Return All Avavailable Time Slots .

messages.content:
User have just Confirmed to book an Appointment . Here is the Date [{{1.data2}}] And Here is the Time Slot [{{1.data1}} ] on Which User want to Book the Appointment . 

INSTRUCTIONS : 
Please Extract the Date and TIme from above Information In this  [ yyyy-mm-ddhh:mm:ss ] Format . 
send only date and time with prefered format in Response 
. No Extra Message Needed in Response Just Date and Time in Prefered format .

mapper.html:
Meeting Invitation

Stay Connected. Stay Informed.

Hello {{1.data3}},

We’re thrilled to have you join us for an upcoming meeting. Here are all the details you need:

Start Time:{{49.choices[].message.content}}

Meeting Duration : 30 Minutes

Platform: Google Meet

Join the Meeting

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please feel free to reach out. We can’t wait to connect with you!

Warm regards,

Netshow

© 2024 Netshow Ltd | All rights reserved.
Visit our website
